title: ‘It’s Special to Win in the Rainbows’: Pogačar Opens Account on 2025 with Screamer Summit Sprint at UAE Tour
content:
Pogačar moves into GC lead of UAE Emirates-XRG's home race after monster sprint on Jebel Jais summit, Tarling digs deep to hold second-place overall.

Read the full article at ‘It’s Special to Win in the Rainbows’: Pogačar Opens Account on 2025 with Screamer Summit Sprint at UAE Tour on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
